title: Ticket #62: Deprecate ALLOW_VM_CRUFT
description:
The time has probably come for the VM cruft to finally go away.

Plan --

  • Discuss with FW DONE: 16 Feb 2010
  • Flip ALLOW_VM_CRUFT default to FALSE DONE
  • File a ticket against 7.7 to remove cruft code DONE: #1221

2010-Feb-16 19:19:14 by matt:
Version History: The default for ALLOW_VM_CRUFT has been changed to FALSE, preventing old VirtualMachine attributes from being included on slots, VM related configuration from being read, and VM related environment variables from being set for jobs. The VM cruft has been deprecated since the 6.7 series and will likely be entirely removed in the 7.7 series.
